Package environmentalSimulator

Interface Summary
MeteorologicalPhenomenon This class represents the interface for all the meteorological phenomena.
 

Class Summary
Coordinates This class represents a set of two coordinates.
GoogleTileUtils A utility class to assist in encoding and decoding google tile references For reasons of my own longitude is treated as being between -180 and +180 and internally latitude is treated as being from -1 to +1 and then converted to a mercator projection before return.
IvyListener Listener of the Ivy Bus.
JpgFilter  
Level This class represents the levels which are associations between a wind speed and a direction at a given height on the vertical profile.
LoadDialog This class represents the file chooser allowing the user to load a formerly created environment.
LocalizedPhenomenon This class represents all the localized phenomena which can be implemented by the user.
MainCoordinatesManager  
MainWindow GUI of the environmental simulator.
Map This class represents the agregation of all of the meteorological phenomena and the topographic elements.
MapControler The MVC Controler for the map section.
MapsGoogle  
SaveDialog This class represents the file chooser allowing the user to save a created environment.
SaveManager Implements method to save and load xml files thanks to jdom.
SpaceCoordinates This class represents a set of three coordinates.
SRTM Class used to load the SRTM data and used them to determine the slope of a precise location
Thermal This class represents the thermal columns as a localized meteorological phenomenon.
Turbulences This class represents the turbulences phenomenon.
VerticalProfile This class represents the vertical profile as a meteorological phenomenon.
VerticalProfileControler The MVC Controler for the vertical profile properties editor.
 

Exception Summary
InputException Exception used when trying to load google tiles.
